PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-09572024-08-28PS
ActFederal Public Sector Labour Relations and Employment Board Act
PrecisAppointment of DREW HEAVENS of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a part-time member of the Federal Public Sector Labour Relations and Employment Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective December 2, 2024.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Appointment of DREW HEAVENS of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a part-time member of the Federal Public Sector Labour Relations and Employment Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective December 2, 2024.
